periods.name: Overnight

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 10am. Mostly sunny. High near 94, with temperatures falling to around 92 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 110. West wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
